description:
This is a full size one bedroom on the third floor of a traditional NYC walk up.  Small bedroom with renovated kitchen and large living room.  Short walk to Central Park, the express train, coffee shop in the building, and walkable to lots of great restaurants, shopping, and bars.

Very cozy set up and respectful neighbors.

Cable, wifi, daily necessities, and easy access to everything you need.  I rarely ever need to take a cab.

Will be readily available with a text or call.

The best part about living here is easy access to Sutton Place Park with incredible views overlooking the east river.

Right by tons of trains and public transportation including the 4,5 express!
name: 1 bedroom to yourself in NYC!
review: highly recommend . super easy and very comfy space and bed. no issues.
